00012 // mem allocation functions for ZLIB's purposes
00013 
00014 voidpf ZAlloc( voidpf opaque, uInt items, uInt size )
00015 {
00016   return( MemAlloc( items * size ) );
00017 }
00018 
00019 void ZFree( voidpf opaque, voidpf address )
00020 {

00024 PTR DecompressInit( BYTE * pCompressedData, UINT32 uiDataSize )
00025 {
00026       z_stream *  pZStream;
00027       int                           iZRetCode;
00028       
00029       // allocate memory for the z_stream struct
00030       pZStream = MemAlloc( sizeof( z_stream ) );
00031       if( pZStream == NULL )
00032       { // out of memory!
00033             return( NULL );
00034       }
00035 
00036       // initial defines
00037       pZStream->zalloc = ZAlloc;
00038       pZStream->zfree = ZFree;
00039       pZStream->opaque = NULL;
00040       
00041       // call the ZLIB init routine
00042       iZRetCode = inflateInit( pZStream );
00043       if( iZRetCode != Z_OK )
00044       { // ZLIB init error!
00045             MemFree( pZStream );
00046             return( NULL );
00047       }
00048       
00049       // set up our parameters
00050       pZStream->next_in = pCompressedData;
00051       pZStream->avail_in = uiDataSize;
00052       return( (PTR) pZStream );
00053 }
00054 
00055 UINT32 Decompress( PTR pDecompPtr, BYTE * pBuffer, UINT32 uiBufferLen )
00056 {
00057       int                           iZRetCode;
00058       z_stream *  pZStream = (z_stream *) pDecompPtr;
00059 
00060       // these assertions is in here to ensure that we get passed a proper z_stream pointer
00061       Assert( pZStream != NULL );
00062       Assert( pZStream->zalloc == ZAlloc );
00063 
00064       if (pZStream->avail_in == 0)
00065       { // There is nothing left to decompress!
00066             return( 0 );
00067       }
00068 
00069       // set up the z_stream with our parameters
00070       pZStream->next_out = pBuffer;
00071       pZStream->avail_out = uiBufferLen;
00072 
00073       // decompress!
00074       iZRetCode = inflate( pZStream, Z_PARTIAL_FLUSH );
00075       Assert( iZRetCode == Z_OK || iZRetCode == Z_STREAM_END );
00076       
00077       return( uiBufferLen - pZStream->avail_out );
00078 }
00079 
00080 void DecompressFini( PTR pDecompPtr )
00081 {
00082       z_stream *  pZStream = (z_stream *) pDecompPtr;
00083 
00084       // these assertions is in here to ensure that we get passed a proper z_stream pointer
00085       Assert( pZStream != NULL );
00086       Assert( pZStream->zalloc == ZAlloc );
00087 
00088       inflateEnd( pZStream );
00089       MemFree( pZStream );
00090 }
00091 
00092 UINT32 CompressedBufferSize( UINT32 uiDataSize )
00093 { // Function that calculates the worst-case buffer size needed to
00094       // hold uiDataSize bytes compressed
00095 
00096       return( uiDataSize + uiDataSize / 10 + 13 );
00097 }
00098 
00099 PTR CompressInit( BYTE * pUncompressedData, UINT32 uiDataSize )
00100 {
00101       z_stream *  pZStream;
00102       int                           iZRetCode;
00103       
00104       // allocate memory for the z_stream struct
00105       pZStream = MemAlloc( sizeof( z_stream ) );
00106       if( pZStream == NULL )
00107       { // out of memory!
00108             return( NULL );
00109       }
00110 
00111       // initial defines
00112       pZStream->zalloc = ZAlloc;
00113       pZStream->zfree = ZFree;
00114       pZStream->opaque = NULL;
00115       
00116       // call the ZLIB init routine
00117       iZRetCode = deflateInit( pZStream, Z_BEST_COMPRESSION );
00118       if( iZRetCode != Z_OK )
00119       { // ZLIB init error!
00120             MemFree( pZStream );
00121             return( NULL );
00122       }
00123       
00124       // set up our parameters
00125       pZStream->next_in = pUncompressedData;
00126       pZStream->avail_in = uiDataSize;
00127       return( (PTR) pZStream );
00128 }

00130 UINT32 Compress( PTR pCompPtr, BYTE * pBuffer, UINT32 uiBufferLen )
00131 {
00132       int                           iZRetCode;
00133       z_stream *  pZStream = (z_stream *) pCompPtr;
00134 
00135       // these assertions is in here to ensure that we get passed a proper z_stream pointer
00136       Assert( pZStream != NULL );
00137       Assert( pZStream->zalloc == ZAlloc );
00138 
00139       if (pZStream->avail_in == 0)
00140       { // There is nothing left to compress!
00141             return( 0 );
00142       }
00143 
00144       // set up the z_stream with our parameters
00145       pZStream->next_out = pBuffer;
00146       pZStream->avail_out = uiBufferLen;
00147 
00148       // decompress!
00149       iZRetCode = deflate( pZStream, Z_FINISH );
00150       Assert( iZRetCode == Z_STREAM_END );
00151       
00152       return( uiBufferLen - pZStream->avail_out );
00153 }
